features: Intense Hydration for Radiant Skin - Our facial mask set delivers deep, lasting hydration that goes beyond the surface, leaving your skin plump and radiant. Say goodbye to dryness and hello to a revitalized complexion with our face mask sheets set.

Gentle Exfoliation for a Brighter You - Choose a sheet mask that provides gentle exfoliation and effectively removes dead skin cells without any harsh abrasives. Enjoy a brighter, more youthful appearance that reflects your inner glow. No more dull, lackluster skin!

Soothing for Stressed Skin - Pamper your skin with the fruit extracts and soothing ingredients in these facial masks. Our hydrating face masks are designed to calm and rejuvenate even the most irritated or stressed skin, leaving you feeling refreshed and revitalized after each use.

Refined Pores and Fine Lines - Enjoy visibly minimized facial pores and reduced fine lines. Our face sheet mask set works to refine the texture of your skin, giving it a smoother, more even look. Each sheet face mask is like a spa day at home!

Age-Defying Antioxidant Power - Experience the benefits of powerful antioxidants that help combat signs of wear and tear. This face mask set is packed with ingredients that work to shield your skin from environmental stressors, leaving you with a youthful, glowing complexion that defies the signs of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.reviewText: These are easy to use! Target use to sell them and I haven’t been able to find them for a long time. They hydrate my skin and relax me. So many different options and the quality is amazing. With the extra I apply on my neck. You can even put them in the fridge, but they were already cold for me. Didn’t break me out as I have sensitive skin. My face is nice, soft, and definitely hydrated especially with winter coming up and everything has been dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I purchased these as a gift and they were received with oohs and ahs by the 20 somethings in the crowd so I assume they are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun for sleepovers!
reviews.reviewText: Such a good value if you are having friends over for a sleepover or for stocking stuffers! Loved how it made my skin glow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these masks! A great variety in the box. The Avatara skin care masks never disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THESE MASKS
reviews.reviewText: WEARING ONE RIGHT NOW AS I WRITE THIS! The first, and really only, masks to ACTUALLY change the look and feel of my skin. After I bought a Christmas special 3 pack from Target (gifted two, kept one) I was obsessed. I looked online after the holidays to try to order more for myself and they were sold out! I thought maybe they weren't getting the two I liked best in again (aloe and moisture surge) so I just decided to order this super pack on Amazon and I'm so glad I did! I genuinely have liked all of them, but my favorites are still the aloe and moisture surge. If you want a special vitamin c or niacinamide mask by this brand, check out Target. But if you like them all and want to try them all, this is the way to go! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This 8 pack mask bundle is great to get since it has variety of mask for different needs.
reviews.reviewText: These are thin so it has a plastic sheet that you remove after you put it on your face.I really like that its thin just like many Korean brand masks. A lot of other brands masks are thick which makes it difficult to fully stick to the face without air pockets or when it starts to dry, the mask starts to lift. This mask being thin helps to adhere to the skin better so the product is evenly distributed.I would apply the excess essence onto the face before putting the mask on. If there is still extra essence, I would apply it to my body.Aside from the individual benefits of each mask, they all made my skin feel hydrated and smooth.It’s a good price point and with positive benefits, I would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and Leaves Face Feeling Fresh!
reviews.reviewText: These are easy to use and they leave face feeling great. Love 'em!
